com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.se

Class PostalInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.se.PostalInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Appendable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntPostalInfo, LocalPostalInfo

    public abstract class PostalInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements Appendable
    This class models postal information of contact objects. Instances may be used to either transform postal information or access attributes of postal information obtained by querying a contact object via a contact info EPP command, the response to which is implemented in the class ContactInfoResponse.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
